82 24 75 02 27 3D CC 5F

82 = 1000 0010 x^7+x
24 = 0010 0100 x^5+x^2
75 = 0111 0101 x^6+x^5+x^4+x^2+1
02 = 0000 0010 x
27 = 0010 0111 x^5+x^2+x+1
3D = 0011 1101 x^5+x^4+x^3+x^2+1
CC = 1100 1100 x^7+x^6+x^3+x^2
5F = 0101 1111 x^6+x^4+x^3+x^2+x+1

1010 A
0110 6
0010 2
0010 2

0101 5
1110 E
0000 0
1010 A

dus eerste stuk van mixnibbles gaat goed

2 * c

1 0100 14 => 1010 = A
0 1100 C
0 0100 4
0 0100 4

0 1010 A
1 1100 1C => 1011 = B
0 0000 0
1 0100 14 => A

3 * c

1 1110 1E
0 1010 A
0 0110 6
0 0110 6

0 1111 F
1 0010 12
0 0000 0
1 1110 1E

s01 = 1 0100 X 0 1010 X 0010 X 0010 = 0001 1110 = 1E = F
s23 = 1010 X 0 1100 X 0 0110 X 0010 = 0000 0010 = 2
s45 = 1010 ^ 0110 ^ 0100 ^ 0110 = 1110 = E
s67 = 1 1110 ^ 0110 ^ 0010 ^ 0100 = 1110 = 1E = F
s89 = 1010 ^ 1 0010 ^ 0000^ 1010 = 1 0010 = 12 = 3
sAB = 0101 ^ 1 1100 ^ 0 0000 ^ 1010 = 1 0011 = 13 = 2 
sCD = 0101 ^ 1110 ^ 0000 ^ 1 1110 = 1 0101 = 15 = 0100 = 4
sEF = 1111 ^ 1110 1 0100 = 1 0101 = 4
